title: Platform-Aware Widget
description: Create a widget that renders differently based on the current platform.
instructions:
Implement a PlatformAwareCard widget that:

1. Detects whether running on web, desktop (Windows/macOS/Linux), or mobile
2. Returns different card styles for each platform category:
   - Web: Card with BorderRadius.circular(16) and elevation 2
   - Desktop: Card with BorderRadius.circular(8) and elevation 4
   - Mobile: Card with BorderRadius.circular(12) and elevation 1
3. Uses kIsWeb for web detection and Platform checks for desktop
4. Displays the platform name as a label in the card
hints: Use kIsWeb from package:flutter/foundation.dart to check for web platform
The Platform class from dart:io is not available on web, so check kIsWeb first
Desktop platforms include Windows, macOS, and Linux
Web uses border radius 16, desktop uses 8, mobile uses 12
